# amount

**Instance Property**

The summary item’s amount.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var amount: NSDecimalNumber { get set }
```

## Discussion

The amount’s currency is specified at the payment level by setting a value for the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest/currencyCode] property on [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest].

## Describing summary items

- **label**: A short, localized description of the item.
- **type**: The summary item’s type that indicates whether the amount is final.
- **PKPaymentSummaryItemType**: Constants that describe the type of the payment summary item, such as final or pending.
